description: 上海科技大学助理教授 Wan Zhiyu 领导的国际研究团队近期在《健康数据科学》杂志上发表了突破性研究成果，指出像 ChatGPT-4 和 LLaVA 这类多模态大型语言模型在从医学图像诊断皮肤疾病时存在偏见。
original_description: An international research team led by Assistant Professor Zhiyu Wan from ShanghaiTech University has recently published groundbreaking findings in the journal Health Data Science, highlighting biases in multimodal large language models (LLMs) such as ChatGPT-4 and LLaVA in diagnosing skin diseases from medical images.

ai_translation.translated_title: 在不同人群群体中，皮肤疾病诊断的AI模型存在偏差
ai_translation.translated_description: 上海科技大学助理教授 Wan Zhiyu 领导的国际研究团队近期在《健康数据科学》杂志上发表了突破性研究成果，指出像 ChatGPT-4 和 LLaVA 这类多模态大型语言模型在从医学图像诊断皮肤疾病时存在偏见。
ai_translation.original_title: Bias found in AI models diagnosing skin diseases across demographics
ai_translation.original_description: An international research team led by Assistant Professor Zhiyu Wan from ShanghaiTech University has recently published groundbreaking findings in the journal Health Data Science, highlighting biases in multimodal large language models (LLMs) such as ChatGPT-4 and LLaVA in diagnosing skin diseases from medical images.

title: 微软想要收购人类排泄物。这是为什么
original_title: Microsoft wants to buy human waste. Here’s why
description: 科技巨头微软已与Vaulted Deep公司签署协议，购买490万吨有机废物，其中包括人类废物、牲畜粪便、食品残渣、农业残余物和纸浆污泥。该协议将于2026年开始，持续12年。值得注意的是，Vaulted Deep公司收集的是人类和农业废物的混合物，称为“生物污泥”，并将之注入地表以下深处。
original_description: Tech giant Microsoft has signed a deal to buy 4.9 million metric tonnes of organic waste, which includes human waste, manure, food scraps, agricultural residue, and paper sludge. The deal with Vaulted Deep will begin in 2026 and run for 12 years. Notably, this company collects a mix of human and agricultural waste, known as ‘bioslurry’, and injects it far below the Earth’s surface

title: 保护刚果森林：新指标将气候融资与实际保护成效挂钩
original_title: Protecting Congo’s Forests: New Metrics Tie Climate Finance to Real Conservation Gains
description: 世界银行的新框架为刚果共和国提供了一个基于科学、与绩效挂钩的模型，以便通过将森林砍伐结果与经济和环境压力相一致来获取气候资金。该框架旨在通过 robust 的、数据驱动的关键绩效指标（KPIs），奖励高森林覆盖率、低森林砍伐率国家的主动森林保护行为。
original_description: The World Bank's new framework offers the Republic of Congo a science-based, performance-linked model to access climate finance by aligning deforestation outcomes with economic and environmental pressures. It aims to reward proactive forest conservation in high-forest, low-deforestation countries through robust, data-driven KPIs.

ai_translation.original_title: Bandai Namco and Sony Form Strategic Partnership to Expand Anime and Manga IP
ai_translation.original_description: Sony acquires a 2.5% stake in Bandai Namco as both companies aim to expand anime and manga IP, sparking speculation about future PlayStation exclusives.

title: 焕然一新的&M&S灯饰，为单调空间增添活力

title: 警方突袭防弹少年团的经纪公司：HYBE掌门人Bang Si Hyuk入狱将如何影响该组合的复出？
original_title: Police raids BTS’ agency: What happens to group’s comeback if HYBE boss Bang Si Hyuk lands in prison?
description: HYBE的突袭行动和Bang Si Hyuk的法律麻烦令粉丝们担忧，BTS的2025回归是否会推迟？随着股价下跌和压力增大，所有目光都聚焦在该经纪公司的下一步行动上。
original_description: HYBE’s raid and Bang Si Hyuk’s legal trouble have fans worried. Will BTS’s 2025 comeback be delayed? As stock dips and pressure mounts, all eyes are on the agency’s next move.
